title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter:** A Powerhouse in Your Vehicle Emergency Kit!

Boost your peace of mind on the road with our top-tier AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. With an impressive 4000 peak current, this powerhouse can jumpstart any gas or up to 10L diesel engine, making it a must-have for all drivers!

Features:
- **Versatile and Powerful:** Jumpstarts cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and even snowmobiles. With 40 start times on a full charge, you'll never be stranded again.
- **Quick Charging:** Recharge your device up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks with USB quick charge 3.0 technology.
- **Smart Protection Systems:** Our intelligent design includes protection against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections for your safety.
- **Multi-functional LED Light:** A built-in LED light comes in handy as a flashlight, SOS signal, or strobe in emergency situations.

Package Contents:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

Additionally, enjoy 24/7 peace of mind with our dedicated 24-hour online after-sales team.

Upgrade your emergency preparedness and get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - a powerful and versatile solution for all your vehicular emergencies! With a massive 4000 peak current and a colossal 27800mAh/88Wh battery capacity, this advanced jump starter is compatible with all gasoline engines and up to 10L diesel engines.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day! This 12V Auto Jump Box comes equipped with an LED light for visibility in dark situations, USB Quick Charge 3.0 ports (compatible with Type-C) to keep your devices powered up, and smart protection systems to safeguard against short circuits, low batteries, high temperatures, or reverse connections.

Recharge your car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile in no time! The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter delivers a charging speed that's 75% faster than ordinary power banks and offers an impressive start-time of 40. Its rugged design and metal clamps ensure durability, making it your ideal traveling companion for any vehicular adventure.

Accessories include jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual. Our dedicated 24-hour online after-sales team is always available to provide you with top-notch support. Start your engine with confidence - get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today!
